page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: Amongst young people fashions in clothes,hairstyles & make-up are strongly influenced by pop culture. TV,pop videos & numerous magazines provide easy access to the latest trends.Although some ideas are widely copied,many are only adopted by specific fans of a particualar group. The success of such pop groups as Culture Club has led to some boys wearing jewellery & make-up when they go out.Short hair with no sideburns has also been a recent trend.Some boys & girls have sought to express themselves through hair colouring,eg. from bleaching to bright colours.TV & magazines have also helped to make many adults more fashion conscious. Styles in suits, shoes,skirts and dresses are constantly changing,under the influence of London fashion designers.
